backend/main.mo: Defines data models for hotels, tickets, bundles, comparisons, and user profiles with authorization mixin and profile lookup logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/.env.capacitor.example: Example environment file defining CAPACITOR_SERVER_URL for Android wrapper builds.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android project build artifacts, IDE files, and keystores.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config setting SDK versions, dependencies, build types, and Capacitor integration.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app metadata, permissions, and Capacitor MainActivity.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main Capacitor activity extending BridgeActivity with default onCreate.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon configuration referencing same drawable layers.
Adaptive launcher icon XML defining background and foreground assets.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: String resources including app name and package identifiers.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build config declaring repositories and Android/Google plugins.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, Jetifier, and JVM args.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings including Capacitor modules and project structure.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, name, web build dir, server URL, and Android options.
frontend/docs/android.md: Detailed Android setup guide covering PWA installation, APK building, environment setup, and troubleshooting.
frontend/docs/README.md: Intro documentation linking to Android guide for PWA install and APK build instructions.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global border and body styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, manifest, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with basic styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up app routing, theming, authentication guard, and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: IDL definitions for backend types including users, groups, albums, hotels, tickets, and comparison input.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a screen name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to the sign-in page and blocks protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays an unauthenticated sign-in screen with branding, messaging, login button, and error alert.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Renders a scrollable chat view with message input, send handling, and auto-scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with background images, top navigation, footer, and route-based title updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows a footer with copyright, branding, and a link to caffeine.ai including the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders top navigation with branding, auth‑aware nav items, profile access, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Displays a grid of photos with tag and delete actions, plus a modal for tagging people.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles image file selection and upload with progress tracking and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Provides a dialog to add, remove, and save manual person tags on a photo using friends or principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: Provides UI to add, edit, and delete hotel offers with room and price details, managing form state and emitting updates.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation, editing, and removal of ticket offers, including type selection, pricing, and currency handling.
frontend/src/components/offers/Transport: Allows users to add and delete transportation offers with mode, provider, class, and price details.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: Handles adding, editing, and removing VIP packages with pricing, inclusions, and optional perks.
frontend/src/components/profile/LegalNam: Displays and edits a user's private legal name, syncing with backend data and providing save functionality.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineStatu: Shows an online/offline status banner by listening to browser connectivity events.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Displays a travel bundle card with pricing, ticket, hotel, transport details, and visual indicators for ranking or special statuses.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Provides a sort selector UI for ordering bundles by price or hotel rating.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gates purchase‑related content behind authentication and parental consent, offering UI to confirm permission.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding values including app name, tagline, and logo paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity, invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, permissions, friends, legal info, and trip/comparison operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables and shared layout styles, including route background system.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Formats numbers into localized currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates ticket-hotel-VIP-transport bundles with cost calculations and finds cheapest transport options.
frontend/src/lib/pwa/registerServiceWork: Registers a service worker in production and periodically checks for updates.
frontend/src/lib/routeBackgrounds.ts: Maps routes to background images and resolves backgrounds with nested route inheritance.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Computes check-in and check-out timestamps around a concert date using days before/after.
frontend/src/lib/upgradeDetection.ts: Evaluates bundles to find cheaper higher-quality upgrades for tickets, transport, and hotel rooms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React app rendering with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays an album with photos, supports uploading and deleting the album.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details, chat messages, and allows posting messages or leaving the group.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups, supports group creation, and navigates to individual group pages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing branding, hero section, and feature steps with navigation to trip builder and saved comparisons.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Displays user photo albums with creation flow; requires authentication and supports adding new albums.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile dashboard showing identity details, legal name section, and saved trip comparisons with delete support.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates and sorts travel bundles from trip data, allows selecting and saving a bundle with upgrade detection.
Shows authenticated users their saved trip comparisons with loading states and deletion options.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects signed‑in users to profile and shows an authentication prompt for unsigned users.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: React page for entering event details and selecting ticket, VIP, hotel, and transport options, then navigating to results if required fields are filled.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, enabling ESNext modules and including vite.config.ts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup for React with env loading, aliasing, dev server proxying, optimized deps, and enforced Internet Identity URL.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project goals, branding, architectural notes, issues, and required assets for the app.
